Package de.thesycon.usbio.structs

Class Summary
HANDLE  
USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR The USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR class contains the head of a descriptor.
USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR USB configuration descriptor class.
USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR USB device descriptor class.
USB_DEVICE_QUALIFIER_DESCRIPTOR USB device qualifier descriptor class.
USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR USB endpoint descriptor class.
USB_HID_DESCRIPTOR USB HID descriptor class.
USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR USB interface descriptor class.
USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR USB string descriptor class.
USBIO_BANDWIDTH_INFO The USBIO_BANDWIDTH_INFO class contains information on the USB bandwidth consumption.
USBIO_BASE_STRUCT The USBIO_BASE_STRUCT class is the base class of USBIO struct classes.
USBIO_CLASS_OR_VENDOR_REQUEST The USBIO_CLASS_OR_VENDOR_REQUEST class provides information used to generate a class or vendor specific device request.
USBIO_CONFIGURATION_INFO The USBIO_CONFIGURATION_INFO class provides information about the interfaces and pipes available in the current configuration.
USBIO_DATA_BUFFER The USBIO_DATA_BUFFER class is used for buffer input/output operations with the UsbIo Java Interface.
USBIO_DEVICE_INFO The USBIO_DEVICE_INFO class contains information on the USB device.
USBIO_DEVICE_PARAMETERS The USBIO_DEVICE_PARAMETERS class contains USBIO driver settings related to a device.
USBIO_DRIVER_INFO The USBIO_DRIVER_INFO class contains version information about the USBIO programming interface (API) and the USBIO driver executable.
USBIO_INTERFACE_CONFIGURATION_INFO The USBIO_INTERFACE_CONFIGURATION_INFO class provides information about an interface.
USBIO_INTERFACE_SETTING The USBIO_INTERFACE_SETTING class provides information used to configure an interface and its endpoints.
USBIO_ISO_PACKET The USBIO_ISO_PACKET class defines the size and location of a single isochronous data packet within an isochronous data transfer buffer.
USBIO_ISO_TRANSFER The USBIO_ISO_TRANSFER data structure provides information about an isochronous data transfer buffer.
USBIO_PIPE_CONFIGURATION_INFO The USBIO_PIPE_CONFIGURATION_INFO class provides information about a pipe.
USBIO_PIPE_CONTROL_TRANSFER The USBIO_PIPE_CONTROL_TRANSFER class provides information used to generate a specific control request.
USBIO_PIPE_PARAMETERS The USBIO_PIPE_PARAMETERS class contains USBIO driver settings related to a pipe.
USBIO_PIPE_STATISTICS The USBIO_PIPE_STATISTICS class contains statistical data related to a pipe.
USBIO_QUERY_PIPE_STATISTICS The USBIO_QUERY_PIPE_STATISTICS class provides options that modify the behaviour of the IOCTL_USBIO_QUERY_PIPE_STATISTICS operation.
USBIO_SET_CONFIGURATION The USBIO_SET_CONFIGURATION class provides information used to set the device configuration.
USBIO_SETUP_PIPE_STATISTICS The USBIO_SETUP_PIPE_STATISTICS class contains information used to configure the statistics maintained by the USBIO driver for a pipe.
